issue.title: '--record plist' doesn't record a complete plist
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16821](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16821). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```setup.py --record plist install``` is supposed to record all installed files into the file ```plist```.

However, this file only gets 363 files of 708 actually installed files.

 

The FreeBSD ports system relies on python's ```--record plist``` feature for autoplist in port.
